data.name: ONE ™ Aeolus
data.detailed_description: ONE ™ Aeolus is a science fiction action game with adventure elements. This is a first-person shooter with a deep plot and an open world. The plot unfolds in 2035 when members of the «AVALON» rescue mission of the «A.M.B.R.A.C.» research company sent to Mars, in order to find out the mysterious reason for the disappearance of the first group of colonists and scientists. The protagonist of the game is Bryan O’Callahan - a young astronaut who wakes up on a ship after a long sleep in hibernation and realizes that the ship is completely empty, and the rest of the crew disappeared without a trace.
data.about_the_game: ONE ™ Aeolus is a science fiction action game with adventure elements. This is a first-person shooter with a deep plot and an open world. The plot unfolds in 2035 when members of the «AVALON» rescue mission of the «A.M.B.R.A.C.» research company sent to Mars, in order to find out the mysterious reason for the disappearance of the first group of colonists and scientists. The protagonist of the game is Bryan O’Callahan - a young astronaut who wakes up on a ship after a long sleep in hibernation and realizes that the ship is completely empty, and the rest of the crew disappeared without a trace.
data.short_description: ONE ™ Aeolus is a science fiction action game with adventure elements. This is a first-person shooter with a deep plot and an open world.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Polish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 or AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050Ti 4GB / GTX 1660 Super or Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9.2 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz Equivalent CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3 Compatible GPU with 1GB Video RAM
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard, mouse + gamepad support.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9.2 or later
  • Processor: 4 GHz Equivalent CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3 Compatible GPU with 2GB Video RAM
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard, mouse + gamepad support.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
